div.p: This section contains documentation for implementers from both the clinical and technical perspectives. The process documentation describes the assumptions and decisions made, as well as a functional description of the recommendations. The integration documentation describes the overall approach and documents the artifacts contained in the IG, while the implementation documentation provides developer-level documentation on how to use the artifacts.
